titleStmt.title: Three speeches spoken at a common-hall, Thursday the 3. of Iuly, 1645. / By Mr. Lisle, Mr. Tate, Mr. Brown, Members of the House of Commons: containing many observations upon the Kings letters, found in his own cabinete at Nasiby fight, and sent to the Parliament by Sir Thomas Fairfax, and read at a common-hall. Published according to order.
titleStmt.author: Lisle, John, ca. 1610-1664.

titleStmt.title: Three speeches spoken at a common-hall, Thursday the 3. of Iuly, 1645. / By Mr. Lisle, Mr. Tate, Mr. Brown, Members of the House of Commons: containing many observations upon the Kings letters, found in his own cabinete at Nasiby fight, and sent to the Parliament by Sir Thomas Fairfax, and read at a common-hall. Published according to order.
titleStmt.author: Lisle, John, ca. 1610-1664.
Tate, Zouch, 1605 or 6-1650.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Peter Cole, at the sign of the Printing-Presse in Cornhill, neer the Royall Exchange,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

person.persName: England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)
